dest_image_alt: Snowflake's web user interface showing a SQL query being evaluated and the tabular results thereof.
dest_ingest_image_alt: Snowflake's web user interface showing a pie chart on a laptop on a wooden desk alongside a Snowflake mug and two plants amongst other things.
dest_ingest_instructions: Finally provide the details of an S3 bucket along with your Snowflake database, warehouse, account, username and password and REFORM will transform your data into analytic ready tables in Snowflake.
